author: Madison Hoff
title: The coronavirus shutdown is revealing America's troubling obsession with work
description: The novel coronavirus outbreak has put a lot of people out of work and at home due to stay at home orders and lockdowns. Former Rhode Island State Representative David Segal recently tweeted that even if Americans continued to stay home for the next several w…
content:
As many states are enforcing stay-at-home orders, non-essential business shutdowns, and lockdowns around the US during the novel coronavirus pandemic, many Americans find themselves not working.   
Americans typically work such long hours that even with a co… [+2003 chars]
